flawed_nl_solution:
There are thirty games in the season because 20 + 10 = <<20+10=50>>50
He needs to get 150 hits on the year to average 3 hits a game because 50 x 3 = <<150=150>>150
He has 40 hits already because 20 x 2 = <<20*2=40>>40
He needs 110 hits in the final 10 games because 150 - 40 = <<150-40=110>>110
He needs to average 11 hits a game because 110 / 10 = <<110/10=11>>11
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 50. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
